step.html_instructions:
Head south on The PATH - City Hall toward The Path - Thomson Bldg
Walk your bicycle

Turn left onto The Path - Thomson Bldg
Walk your bicycle

Continue onto The PATH - Simpson-Thomson
Walk your bicycle

Turn left to stay on The PATH - Simpson-Thomson
Walk your bicycle
Waterfront Trail turns slightly right and becomes Breezy Dr
Front Rd turns slightly left and becomes Annland St

Turn right onto Cobbledick Rd
Restricted usage road
Mill St S turns left and becomes Boulton St
Turn left onto Mill St N/County Rd 28 N (signs for County Road 28/ON-401)
Turn right to stay on Trans Canada Trail
Slight left to stay on Ottawa River Pathway
Slight right to stay on Ottawa River Pathway
Turn right onto Lemieux St (signs for Rue Labelle Street)
Turn right toward Mer Blue - Prescott Russel Trail
Turn left onto Mer Blue - Prescott Russel Trail

Continue onto Prescott-Russell Recreational Trail
Entering QC

Turn right onto Rue Saint Jean Baptiste O/QC-342 E
Continue to follow QC-342 E

Turn left onto Autoroute du Souvenir/Autoroute 20 E
Walk your bicycle
Continue straight to stay on Donegani Ave
Turn right toward Avenue de la Baie de Valois
Turn right onto Avenue de la Baie de Valois
Turn left toward Rue de la Commune O
Turn right onto Rue de la Commune O
Turn right to stay on Rue de la Commune O

Turn right onto Rue Notre-Dame E
Destination will be on the left

route.warning: Bicycling directions are in beta. Use caution – This route may contain streets that aren't suited for bicycling.
